text: tatha tumase jitanee ho sake, unake lie shakti tatha seema raksha ke lie ghode taiyaar rakho, jisase allaah ke shatruon tatha apane shatruon ko aur inake siva doosaron ko darao[1], jinhen tum nahin jaanate, unhen allaah hee jaanata hai aur allaah kee raah mein tum jo bhee vyay (kharch) karoge, tumhen poora milega aur tumapar atyaachaar nahin kiya jaayega
